name: Hooks
description:
Hooks is a small group project made in five weeks for a class assignment. It is a pixel platformer intended for speedrunning. 

Playable game above is a small demo, download the game below for more, this has actual levels for you to play

Help our little friend hook, zip and swing his way though the levels and reach the door to the next level.

An issue has caused the game to be unable to complete. We are working on a fix but it will take some time

Controls:

A and D: Left and right movement.

R: reset (or any button if dead)

Space: Jump.

Mouse left, middle and right Buttons: Hook.
